sense.def:
Kar je
warm
, ima v sebi nekaj toplote, a ne dovolj, da bi bilo vroče.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To warm a part of one's body
pomeni primakniti del telesa k ognju ali grelcu, da tisti del telesa ne bi bil več hladen.

seg.quote: I warmed my hand on the radiator.
Come and warm yourself in front of the fire.

sense.def:
Oblačila in odeje, ki so
warm
, so iz blaga, kot je volna; varujejo nas pred mrazom.

seg.quote: I'll see that Chris dresses warmly.

sense.def:
Kdor je
warm
, je prijazen in ljubeč.

seg.quote: She had a warm, generous heart.
He was given a warm welcome.
He shook Tony warmly by the hand.

sense.def:
To warm to a person
pomeni nekoga vzljubiti.
To warm to an idea
pomeni začeti se zanimati za neko zamisel.

seg.quote: This makes you warm to Meadows.
He warmed to the prospect of a new job.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
warms something up
ali kadar nekaj
warms up
, nekaj postaja bolj vroče.

seg.quote: Start warming up the soup now.
When the weather warmed up mosquitoes began swarming.

sense.def:
To warm up for an event
pomeni pripraviti se na neko prireditev, na primer dirko, tako da delamo vaje ali treniramo, tik preden se začne.

Kadar neki stroj ali motor
warms up
, postane pripravljen za uporabo kmalu potem, ko ga vklopimo ali vžgemo.
